document.full_text: south sudan's president salva kiir called on north sudan thursday to withdraw its forces from the disputed abyei region but said there would be no war over the incursion and it would not derail independence.
document.title: there will be no war over abyei: south sudan
lines_and_colors: south sudan's president salva kiir called on north sudan thursday to withdraw its forces from the disputed abyei region but said there would be no war over the incursion and it would not derail independence.
